item.title: About RSSHub
item.description: RSSHub is a RSS Reader for mac. RSSHub shows you articles from your favorite blogs and news sites, and it keeps track of what you’ve read. Features Direct feed-downloading All Unread and Today smart feeds Importing and exporting OPML feed lists Starred articles Dark Mode Folders

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: RSSHub is a RSS Reader for mac. RSSHub shows you articles from your favorite blogs and news sites, and it keeps track of what you’ve read. Data Collection RSSHub has a very strict privacy policy – we don’t want any private information about you. Changes To This Privacy Policy If we decide to change our privacy policy, we will post those changes on this page. Contact US If there are any questions regarding this privacy policy you may contact us using the information below.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: 西贝资讯是专为cnBeta打造的一款资讯阅读应用，在这里您可以浏览科技，互联网和IT业界资讯。 数据收集 西贝资讯不会搜集您任何信息。 本隐私政策的变更 如果我们决定更改我们的隐私政策，我们会在此页面上发布这些更改。 联系我们 如果对本隐私政策有任何疑问，您可以使用以下信息与我们联系。 secnettool@gmail.com

item.title: Introduction of SpeedHost for macOS
item.description: SpeedHost is a proxy utility which used Network Extension Technology. Features Support to add SS Server. Support Auto mode and Global mode Support Scan QR Code and Generate QR Code. No registration and login, easy to use. Download on the App Store Screenshots

item.title: Privacy Policy of SpeedHost
item.description: SpeedHost is a proxy utility which used Network Extension Technology. Support to add SS Server. Data Collection We do not provide SS server information. We do not collect your server information. When you connected. We do not collect logs of your activity, including no logging of browsing history, traffic destination, data content, or DNS queries. We also never store connection logs, meaning no logs of your IP address, your outgoing VPN IP address, connection timestamp, or session duration.

item.title: mdEditor - Markdown文本编辑器
item.description: mdEditor是一个简单易用的Markdown文档编辑器，它可以将您的Markdown文本内容渲染成排版漂亮的HTML并显示在预览窗口中，您还可以选择将它导出为HTML或PDF文件并保存在您的文件浏览器里。 主要功能 支持使用工具栏快速插入Markdown语法。 支持多种主题并高亮显示的Markdown文本编辑器。 支持HTML预览，并可以导出为HTML和PDF文件。 支持使用浏览器上传，下载，删除文件和创建目录。 截图

item.title: mdEditor for iOS
item.description: Markdown is a plain text formatting syntax created by John Gruber, aiming to provide a easy-to-read and feasible markup. The original Markdown syntax specification can be found here. mdEditor is created as a simple-to-use editor for Markdown documents. I render your Markdown contents into HTML, and display them in a preview panel. Features Support use the toolbar to insert markdown syntax. Support export to HTML and PDF. Support multiple themes for the editor.

item.title: Privacy Policy of mdEditor
item.description: mdEditor is created as a simple-to-use editor for Markdown documents. I render your Markdown contents real-time into HTML, and display them in a preview panel. Data Collection mdEditor will not collect any of your information. Changes To This Privacy Policy If we decide to change our privacy policy, we will post those changes on this page. Contact US If there are any questions regarding this privacy policy you may contact us using the information below.

item.title: mdEditor - Markdown Editor
item.description: Markdown is a plain text formatting syntax created by John Gruber, aiming to provide a easy-to-read and feasible markup. The original Markdown syntax specification can be found here. mdEditor is created as a simple-to-use editor for Markdown documents. I render your Markdown contents real-time into HTML, and display them in a preview panel. Features Support Code and Syntax Highlighting. Support export to HTML with Styles and Syntax Highlighting Support six themes for the editor.

item.title: Introduction of Yings for iOS
item.description: Overview Yings is a proxy utility which used shadowsocks, shadowsocks is a secure socks5 proxy, designed to protect your internet traffic. Features Super Fast and secured with industry level encryption algorithm. Suports auto mode and global mode With eight built-in proxy servers, more proxy servers will be available soon. No registration and login, easy to use. The difference of Auto Mode and Global Mode Auto Mode: You know some websites is blocked in some country.

item.title: Introduction of Yings for macOS
item.description: Overview Yings is a proxy utility which used shadowsocks, shadowsocks is a secure socks5 proxy, designed to protect your internet traffic. Features Super Fast and secured with industry level encryption algorithm. Suports auto mode and global mode With eight built-in proxy servers, more proxy servers will be available soon. No registration and login, easy to use. The difference of Auto Mode and Global Mode Auto Mode: You know some websites is blocked in some country.

item.title: Privacy Policy of Yings
item.description: Yings is a proxy utility which used shadowsocks, shadowsocks is a secure socks5 proxy, designed to protect your internet traffic. Data Collection Yings is just a proxy tool that provides network acceleration. We do not collect logs of your activity, including no logging of browsing history, traffic destination, data content, or DNS queries. We also never store connection logs, meaning no logs of your IP address, your outgoing VPN IP address, connection timestamp, or session duration.

item.title: Introduction of Secnettool for macOS
item.description: What is VPN? A VPN, or virtual private network, is a secure tunnel between two or more devices. VPNs are used to protect private web traffic from snooping, interference, and censorship. What is Secnettool? Secnettool is an IPsec VPN App, which encrypts your network traffic, so that nobody between you and the VPN server can eavesdrop on your data as it travels via the Internet. This is especially useful when using unsecured networks, e.

item.title: Introduction of Secnettool for iOS
item.description: What is VPN? A VPN, or virtual private network, is a secure tunnel between two or more devices. VPNs are used to protect private web traffic from snooping, interference, and censorship. What is Secnettool? Secnettool is an IPsec VPN App, which encrypts your network traffic, so that nobody between you and the VPN server can eavesdrop on your data as it travels via the Internet. This is especially useful when using unsecured networks, e.

item.title: Privacy Policy of Secnettool
item.description: SecNetTool is an IPsec VPN App, which encrypts your network traffic, so that nobody between you and the VPN server can eavesdrop on your data as it travels via the Internet. This is especially useful when using unsecured networks, e.g. at coffee shops, airports or hotel rooms. Data Collection We do not collect logs of your activity, including no logging of browsing history, traffic destination, data content, or DNS queries. We also never store connection logs, meaning no logs of your IP address, your outgoing VPN IP address, connection timestamp, or session duration.
